1560.descriptionUI: %(DamageCombo) 2+2+2 %(AltCombo) 8+9+9 %(ChargeUp)Turns you into a whirlwind that shocks enemies - release to do 6 damage to normal enemies or 21 damage to Skeletons and knock them back

1565.descriptionUI: %(DamageCombo) 2+2+2 %(AltCombo) 7+7+8 %(ChargeUp) Transform into a whirlwind that slows enemies; release to deal 4 damage to enemies or 10 damage to Skeletons and freeze them in place
1565.name: Ice Spinjitzu Attack

1567.descriptionUI: %(DamageCombo) 2+2+2 %(AltCombo) 7+8+10 %(ChargeUp)Turns you into a whirlwind that stuns enemies - release to set enemies ablaze for 5 damage to normal enemies or 16 damage to Skeletons

1570.descriptionUI: Shields you from up to 10 damage for 30 seconds
